tr.td: The screen below shows the current valuations of your Acme holdings. You can also find out the value of separate funds using the search options below.

span.title: You must select a value for Fund Provider.

img.alt: Transaction History for A999999A1F / Acme Investment ISA

td.span: Aberdeen Ethical World Equity A Fund Inc
Henderson Global Care UK Income A Fund Inc
^Schroder Gbl Property Income Maximiser Z Fund Inc

img.alt: Transaction History for A999999A1F / Acme Cash Account

td.p:
Notes
Unit trust holdings - valuations are at the bid price. OEIC and SICAV holdings - valuations are at Net Asset Value price. All unit prices are subject to daily fluctuation and may go down as well as up. As fund transactions are placed on a forward-pricing basis, the valuation shown is not necessarily the price you would receive if you redeemed your investment. Pricing data is provided by Financial Express Prestel.
This valuation shows the assets held within your LGII International Portfolio Bond on the Acme platform only. This excludes cash and other investments held with LGII International Portfolio Bond within the bond but not on the Acme platform. Please speak to the product provider if you need further information on any assets held off-platform.
Portfolio Bond Standard holdings only - valuations are based on the unit price calculated at the date shown and exclude the value of any bonds marked 'work in progress'. Please note that online valuations is currently unavailable for the Portfolio Bond Initial Charge and High Allocation charging options.
SIPP holdings only - only pension assets held on the Acme platform are reflected in your valuation. Please refer to your pension provider for details of any other self-invested pension assets you may hold with a third party.
This screen displays a unique platform account reference for each investor, combination of investors and discrete designation on the platform. The platform account reference has been introduced to facilitate future development including cash functionality. At this time you do not need to quote this reference.
The value of these investments can go down as well as up.
It's worth noting that the total value of your investments shown in your valuation doesn't include any transactions that were partially completed at the time of the valuation e.g. transactions such as switches or transfers and that the value of your investments can go down as well as up dependent on market conditions.
Valuations do not include money held in the rebate cash account.
The fund marker (^) in front of the fund names indicates commission free funds.

a.title: Opens LRQA website in a new window.

div.p: Acme Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority FCA Registration No 194734.
* Telephone lines are open Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm. Calls may be recorded for training and quality purposes.
